data.title: Go Kart Race Track Rental For Private Track Days, Orange County - SoCal
data.meta_description: Rent one of our two indoor go kart race tracks at K1 Speed Irvine for your own private track day in Orange County! Learn more here.
data.text:
Host your own private track day with your friends or family – rent one of our go kart race tracks at K1 Speed Irvine!

We have two tracks available for rent by the hour for your group’s private use. Track rentals are perfect for car clubs, racing fanatics, or just as a unique event for your next family / friend get together! Enjoy race after race with little to zero wait times!

Read on to learn more about using K1 Speed Irvine for your own private track day in Orange County.

So if you’re looking for a race track to rent in Southern California in the Orange County area, look no further than K1 Speed Irvine! There’s no need to worry about damaging your own car, and no extra expenses like tires, either. Take advantage of one of our single track rentals and spend a day at the track with your friends!

To get started, please give us a call at 1-855-K1-SPEED or click the button below to send a request form to one of our event coordinators.
